thread.title: Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies
thread.title_full: Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies

title: Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies
text:
Rich Schultz Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies 
Miami Marlins' Christian Yelich, left, and Dee Gordon smile after they scored on Justin Bour's two-run double against the Philadelphia Phillies during the first inning of the second game of a baseball doubleheader Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz) Rich Schultz Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies 
Miami Marlins' Christian Yelich hits an RBI-double against the Philadelphia Phillies during the second inning of the second game of a baseball doubleheader Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz) Rich Schultz Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies 
Miami Marlins Dee Gordon steals second base as Philadelphia Phillies shortstop Chase d'Arnaud (2) waits for the throw during the sixth inning of the first game of a baseball doubleheader, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz) Rich Schultz Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies 
Miami Marlins Dee Gordon scores after stealing third base and advancing on a throwing error by Philadelphia Phillies catcher Carlos Ruiz, not in picture, during the sixth inning of the first game of a baseball doubleheader, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz) Rich Schultz Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies 
Miami Marlins pitcher Tom Koehler delivers against the Philadelphia Phillies during the first inning of the first game of a baseball doubleheader Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz) Rich Schultz Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies 
Philadelphia Phillies second baseman Darnell Sweeney throws to first base to get Miami Marlins' Christian Yelich who beats it out for a single during the first inning of the first game of a baseball doubleheader Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz) Rich Schultz Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies 
Philadelphia Phillies Cody Asche hits a bases loaded triple against the Miami Marlins in the third during the first inning of the first game of a baseball doubleheader, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz) Rich Schultz Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies 
Miami Marlins pitcher Tom Koehler (34) delivers a pitch against the Philadelphia Phillies during the first inning of the first game of a baseball doubleheader, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz) Rich Schultz Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies 
Miami Marlins Jeff Mathis hits a home run against the Philadelphia Phillies during the third inning of the first game of a baseball doubleheader, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz) Rich Schultz Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies 
Miami Marlins Justin Bour hits a two run double against the Philadelphia Phillies during the first inning of the second game of a baseball doubleheader, Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, in Philadelphia. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz) Yelich, Gordon have special days as Marlins sweep Phillies   
PHILADELPHIA (AP) — Dee Gordon got his 200th hit of the season in the opener, and Christian Yelich tied a club record with hits in eight straight at-bats as the Miami Marlins won the nightcap 5-2 to complete a doubleheader sweep of the Philadelphia Phillies Saturday. 
Yelich was 5 for 5 in the first game, a 7-6 victory, then hit safely in his first three at-bats in the second. In the first game, Gordon became the first Marlins player since Hanley Ramirez in 2007 to record 200 hits with a sixth-inning single. kAmQxE C62==J >62?E 2 =@E E@ >6[Q v@C5@?
